name: Tradewinds Negroni (Angostura, Sweet Vermouth, and Cointreau Cocktail)
description: Justin Elliott of The Townsend in Austin created this spicy variation on the Negroni using equal parts sweet vermouth, Cointreau, and Angostura bitters. That's right: It's a lot of Angostura bitters.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce (30ml) sweet vermouth, such as Cocchi Vermouth di Torino

recipeInstructions.text: Add sweet vermouth, Cointreau, and Angostura bitters to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled, about 25 seconds. Strain into an Old Fashioned glass with a large ice cube. Express orange oils from twist over drink, garnish with twist, and serve.
